function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate number of medical beds for infected individuals","Impact":"Increased spread of COVID-19 and overwhelmed healthcare system","Mitigation":"Increase the number of medical beds and facilities for infected individuals","Technologies":"Hospital bed management systems, telemedicine, field hospitals","People":"Infected individuals, healthcare workers, hospital administrators","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Ineffective self-protection measures under strict quarantine","Impact":"Limited impact of self-protection measures in reducing the spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Concentrate self-protection resources on high-risk populations, such as medical staff and essential workers","Technologies":"Facial recognition technology for access control, distribution tracking systems for resources","People":"Medical staff, material distribution staff, relevant leaders","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Insufficient intervention time for designating hospitals","Impact":"Delayed response to the COVID-19 outbreak, leading to increased spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Implement early intervention measures for hospital designation and resource allocation","Technologies":"Data analytics for early detection, predictive modeling for outbreak response","People":"Government health agencies, emergency response teams, hospital administrators","Owner":"Government health agencies, emergency response teams"}]}
